reviewText: If Father of the pride was a short-lived tv series which is now on dvd. Then why can't this show be released on dvd?

I agree wholeheartedly with rawrrr's comment. I've been looking everywhere - EVERYWHERE - for this but it seems like Amazon is the only that has it listed on sale. And it's not even for sale! From what I've read, this is a good show and it's such a pity that it was canceled by Fox. Please release this, Amazon!

this is the show that launched the careers of anne hathaway (The Princess Diaries, The Devil Wears Prada), jesse eisenberg (The Social Network, Zombieland), and eric christian olsen (NCIS Los Angeles). it was a great family show that got canceled way too soon. please put it on dvd, or at least make it available on video-on-demand.
i've been waiting and looking everywhere for this show and i don't understand why it was put up on here and still hasn't been released, what is taking so long? is it even coming?
